oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Don't miss the musical feast headed by the Black Swan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Musicians
African American women singers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Advertisement for a performance by M. Magdalene Tartt at the Ryman Auditorium in Nashville.

This advertisement, for a performance by M. Magdalene Tartt, the "Black Swan," shows that some venues, such as the Ryman Auditorium, would allow African Americans to rent the space for concerts and other events.
